docs.summary: A page is a web page that can contain other elements.
description: Some `Page` properties refer only to the central part of the web page as show here:
![Wix Page](images/page.png "Wix Page")
For example, elements placed within this central area are the page's
[children](#children), but elements placed in the page
[header]($w.Header.html) are not.
Other `Page` properties refer to the page in general.
The `Page` is part of the [`Document`]($w.Document.html).
The page description is a meta tag. It provides potential site visitors
with a summary of what the page is about. It is not visible to users,
but appears below your site's title in search results.
A page's `description` is set in the Editor
using the Page Settings panel.
The page's keywords
are not used by Google, but may be used by other search engines.
Page `keywords` are set in the Editor using the
Page Settings panel.
The page title is used in:
+ Search results.
+ When saving to favorites.
+ In the browser's tab.
A page's `title` is set in the Editor
using the Page Settings panel.

notes: The `title` in Preview mode is different than the `title` of the published site.

docs.summary: Indicates if the page is included in the site's menu.
description: Whether a page is visible in the site menu is set in the Editor
using the Page Settings panel.

examples.title: Get whether the page appears in the site menu

FAQs.title: Are all elements on a page considered the page's 'children'?
FAQs.markdown: Only elements placed in the central part of the [page](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Page.html) are the page's [`children`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Page.html#children).

FAQs.title: How do I check my page's SEO description?
FAQs.markdown: You can get your page's SEO description using the [`description`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Page.html#description) property.

FAQs.title: How do I check if a specific page is included in the site menu?
FAQs.markdown: Use the [`visibleInMenu`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Page.html#visibleInMenu) property to check if the page is included in the site menu.
